definition: unit of area equal to 100 畝|亩[mu3] or 6.67 hectares/a short while/a little while ago/circa. (for approximate dates)
quarter (hour)/moment/to carve/to engrave/to cut/oppressive/classifier for short time intervals
gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent
between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms

sentences.english: Livestock in the tens of thousands has been lost.
sentences.chinese: 数以万计的牲畜顷刻间消失。

sentences.english: Hailstones bounce against the grass and splash into the puddles.
sentences.chinese: 顷刻间草地上银珠乱蹦，水洼里水花四溅。

sentences.english: And instant, I was newly submerged by such mellow milk smells.
sentences.chinese: 顷刻间，再一次被清醇的奶油香征服。

sentences.english: Instantly lies in ruins, microcontinent, my peers.
sentences.chinese: 顷刻间废墟一片，林浩，我的同龄人。

sentences.english: In a short instant seem fives above the pure white face red print.
sentences.chinese: 白皙的脸上顷刻间就出现五条红印。

sentences.english: Seconds later, a tremendous blast shook lower Manhattan.
sentences.chinese: 顷刻间，一场足以撼动曼哈顿的爆炸就响起。

sentences.english: In a second the jinnee was back with the Princess asleep in his arms.
sentences.chinese: 顷刻间灯神就抱着熟睡的公主回来了。

definition: in the wink of an eye/in a flash
in a flash/in the twinkling of an eye
loudly/with a loud bang/a loud rumble
